page.title: 02RECREATION AROUND PEBMARSH
page.content: Our area has two{Riding Stables,}one at Daws Cross and one at Brickhouse Farm.At Brickhouse Farm there is an indoor riding school. Many people like{gardening}and there are some beautiful gardens to be seen in the summer. Pebmarsh has a{Church Choir}which practises on Friday evenings. There some delightful walks nearby and many people enjoy{walking.}Some energetic people{jog}around the quiet lanes. {Pebmarsh Football Club}play on the pitch at Clay Hills.There is a Saturday team and a Sunday team. {Shooting}is a leisure activity for some men.They shoot mainly pheasants,partridges,rabbits,hares and pigeons. {Swimming}and{watching television}are other popular leisure activities.
